titles.title: To extend the temporary reduction of duty on Pyrithiobac-sodium.
To extend the temporary reduction of duty on Pyrithiobac-sodium.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2011, the temporary reduction of duty on mixtures of sodium-2-chloro-6-[(4,6 dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)thio]benzoate (CAS No. 123343-16-8) and application adjuvants (Pyrithiobac-sodium).
